A minimal, publication-friendly theme for image slices

Source: R/theme.R
theme_neuro.Rd

Quiet axes, thin panel border, no grid, generous margins, slim legend.

Usage

theme_neuro(base_size = 10, base_family = "")

Arguments

base_size

Base font size.

base_family

Base font family.
